description:
8.119 virtualbass
Apply audio Virtual Bass filter.

This filter accepts stereo input and produce stereo with LFE (2.1) channels output.
The newly produced LFE channel have enhanced virtual bass originally obtained from both stereo channels.
This filter outputs front left and front right channels unchanged as available in stereo input.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: virtualbass

parameters.description: Set the virtual bass cutoff frequency. Default value is 250 Hz. Allowed range is from 100 to 500 Hz.
parameters.name: cutoff

parameters.description: Set the virtual bass strength. Allowed range is from 0.5 to 3. Default value is 3.
parameters.name: strength

source:
8.119 virtualbass

Apply audio Virtual Bass filter.

This filter accepts stereo input and produce stereo with LFE (2.1) channels output. The newly produced LFE channel have enhanced virtual bass originally obtained from both stereo channels. This filter outputs front left and front right channels unchanged as available in stereo input.

The filter accepts the following options:

cutoff

Set the virtual bass cutoff frequency. Default value is 250 Hz. Allowed range is from 100 to 500 Hz.

strength

Set the virtual bass strength. Allowed range is from 0.5 to 3. Default value is 3.
